items.content_html: A lightweight and interactive To-Do List application built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This app allows users to add, mark as complete, and delete their tasks while storing them in local storage, ensuring that tasks persist even after refreshing the page

This app allows users to add, mark as complete, and delete their tasks while storing them in local storage, ensuring that tasks persist even after refreshing the page
